## CREATE SSH KEY:


# command:
- ssh_keygen
- este comando genera las claves publicas y privadas y las guarda en un directorio.
- - Your identification has been saved in /home/loray21/.ssh/id_rsa (privada)
- - Your public key has been saved in /home/loray21/.ssh/id_rsa.pub (publica)

## show public key
- cat id_rsa.pub
- ssh-rsa  loray21@green-liveconsole10

## Connect with git:

```
 Go to settings-> ssh-key-> createnewkey -> paste the key
 ```
